1112.content:
It was the day after the debut of "Alien Love", the play Chase had wrote for Mr. Fletcher's class that was used for PCA's annual fall production. Chase had woke up that morning still feeling sick, but he wanted to go tell Zoey how proud he was of her performance. After changing into a t-shirt, a pair of shirts, some white socks, and tennis shoes, he was out the door.

He arrived outside of room 101 and knocked.
Dana answered, "What do you need?"
Chase responded, "Is Zoey here?" He coughed.
"No," said Dana.
"Do you know where she is?"
"No." Dana proceeded to slam the door.

Chase continued to cough as Quinn was walking by.

"Are you okay Chase?" Asked Quinn.
"Yeah I'm---" Chase let out a huge sneeze.
"I can cure you, come with me!" said Quinn. She then took Chase's arm and dragged him behind her.
1112.title: I Can Cure You!

choices: Quin moves to another part of the body
11121.content:
Quinn brought him into her room.

"I've been working on a new invention that can help cure the flu," Quinn explained.

"How's it work?" Chase asked.

"I'll show you!" Quinn exclaimed with a grin.

Quinn brought Chase over to her bed. She pulled off a sheet revealing two pairs of stocks. One at the head and one at the foot of her bed.

She opened them. "Put your hands and feet in these holes."

"Why exactly...?" Chase asked with skepticism.

"Do you wanna be cured or not?" She replied.

"Alright but you better not do some weird surgery on me or something," he warned.

Chase laid stomach up on Quinn's bed. She locked his arms and feet into the stocks. His arms were raised above his head.

"Okay, so how do you cure me?" Chase pondered.

"With this!" Quinn answered, holding a small metal item that resembled a remote control.

"And what is that?" Chase asked with growing concern.

"This is a device that will send proton impulses on the soles of your feet," said Quinn.

She moved towards Chase's converse sneakers and began to untie them.

"Wait! Quinn I don't know if I want to do this," Chase exclaimed.

"Oh. Don't be a baby!" Quinn teased. By now, she had removed his socks to reveal two bare feet.

Chase's toes crunched with nervousness. His shook his feet in the stocks.

"Stop fidgeting," Quinn ordered. She used 10 strings on the stocks to tie his toes back, rendering them immobile.

Chase gulped.

She pressed a big, red button releasing waves of green lights along his slender feet.

"HAHAHAHAHA!" Chase laughed.

"IT TICKLES TOO MUCH!" He howled.

The proton impulses raced in between Chase's toes. They went up and down his pale sole.

"QUINN!!! STOP!!!" Chase begged.

Just then, Quinn turned the dial, increasing the proton impulse.

Tears rushed down his face as he shook his whole body trying to get loose.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHA!" Chase shrieked.
11121.title: Proton Impulses

112.content:
Chase was soaking wet... in tomato juice. It was another prank played on him by his jerk of a roommate, logan.
"If only I could get back at him" chase thought. Then he got an idea.

Later that night, after chase and logan were in their room watching tv when chase said to logan,
"Hey logan, you should try sitting in this new chair I bought. Its right over there by my computer desk!" Chas said.

"Chase, you've had that chair since we came to PCA 3 years ago." Logan said sounding annoyed.
"Yeah, but have you ever actually sat in it?" Chase asked.

"Well no..." Logan replied
"So go sit in it and see how comfortable it is!" Chase said excitingly.
"Alright fine, if it'll get you to shut up" Logan said, still sounding annoyed.
As soon as Logan sat in the chair chase ran over to him and tied his arms behind the chair so that he could not move

"CHASE! WHAT ARE YOU DOING?!" Logan asked furiously.
"Getting you back for all the pranks you've played on me." Chase said smiling.
"Oh yeah? Well NOTHING you could ever do will be as good as all the pranks i've played on you!" Logan said in a bragging tone.
"Oh yeah? Well what if i told you I was going to tickle you senseless?" Chase asked slyly.
"Err.... umm... yeah go ahead it still wouldn't be as good as the pranks i've pulled on you!" Logan said sounding nervous
"Good, so you wouldn't mind telling me where your ticklish?" Chase inquired.
"No, I wouldnt" Logan bragged. "I'm most ticklish on my feet, especially in between my toes!" and as quickly as he said it he wished he hadn't.

"Well alright then, lets just see how 'lame' tickling you will turn out!" Chase said as he walked over to Logans feet.

Chase tied Logans feet together just to make 100% sure that Logan wouldn't escape.

"Well, these shoes must come off then." Chase said as he untied his shoes and pulled them off.

"WAIT, CHASE! I changed my mind, tickling me is so much better than any of my pranks!! I promise i'll never prank you again if you don't tickle my feet!!" Logan begged

"Sorry Logan, it's too late to back out now!" Chase said with a smirk on his face

And with that Chase began to tickle Logan's socked feet. Logan went into hysterics as Chase spread his fingers all over Logans feet.
"HAHAHHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAH CCHHHHASE AHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHA SSSS SAHAHHA STAAHAHAHPPP HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA PLEASEHAHAHAHAHHAHAHA" Logan begged
"Wow Logan, your already hysterical, and i've yet to take off your socks!" Chase said in an evil tone

"PLEASE CHASE DON'T TAKE MY SOCKS OFF!! MY FEET ARE SO TICKLISH I'M BEGGING YOU!!" Logan pleaded.

But still, chase proceeded to take off Logans white ankle socks.
Logan wiggled his toes to try to prevent chase from taking off his socks, but it was no use because with a little tickle, the socks were off and chase began tickling Logan's ticklish, tan bare feet.

He quickly ran his finger up and down Logans left foot for a minute, and did the same to the right foot, which drove logan insane.

"AHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAA PLEASE STOP CHASE HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH!!!!!"

but chase didn't stop. next he focused on Logan's toes and slid his finger in between Logans sensitive, ticklish little toes, and when he was through with that, he took out some feathers and slid them in between his toes.
"HAHHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHSSSSTAHAHAHHAAAAAHHPP!!HAHA HAHAHAH PLEASSSE!!HHAHA"

Next, Chase took out an electric toothbrush, and scrubbed Logan's feet with it, letting it vibrate underneath and in between his ticklish little piggy's.

Finally chase stopped and said,
"I'm not sure if I should keep tickling your feet, or tickle somewhere else.."
............
112.title: Chase gets revenge on Logan

Then Chase digs into Logan's left foot.

Chase then moves Logan to the bed and ties him up again. Chase then puts his sweat suit on and says we going to sweat while I tickle you. Logan then starts to wiggle as Chase digs into his socks. choices: Quinn uses the feather on his ribs and belly.
Quinn uses the feather on his armpits
114.content:
"Hey Dustin," said Quinn.

"Oh, hey Quinn," Dustin replied, "What's up?"

"I think I found a solution to your problem," said Quinn.

"What problem?" Dustin asked.

"Ya know.....your ticklishness."

"Keep it down!" Dustin snapped. The last thing he needed was for people to find out his most dreaded secret. Dustin was incredibly ticklish; especially on his feet. He still had nightmares about the time that Zoey held his foot in front of the water filter in their swimming pool at home for what seemed like hours. He was driven to tears from that ticklish assault. Zoey still tormented him every now and then; poking at his ribs and armpits when he streched and when they were home she would tickle his feet in order for him to wake up.

"What do you mean you have a solution?" he asked.

"I can cure it," replied Quinn, "With a new laser I've invented." You remember the one that was supposed to cure your cold by apply proton impulses to your feet?"

"Uh...sure?" Dustin said; confused by Quinn's scientific terms.

"The one that tickled you instead of curing you," Qinn said, sounding annoyed.

"Oh yeah," Dustin said. He had nightmares about that incident, too.

"Well," said Quinn, "I've updated it so that it can cure ticklishness! It'll make millions if I put it on the market, what with so many people that are ticklish nowadays! I was wondering if you could be my first test subject."

"Sure, I'll do it!" excitedly said Dustin. He would do anything to get rid of being ticklish. Maybe now he could stand a chance against Zoey in a tickle fight. Zoey was extremely ticklish, too, but nowhere near as ticklish as Dustin.


Later in Quinn's room:

"Just go ahead and lie down on the bed," said Quinn.

Quinn puts Dustin in stocks just as she did when she tried to cure him of his cold. She also added arm restraints that streched Dustin's arms above his head. "This made him uncomfortable Is she planning something?" He thought.

Quinn got the laser all ready to go when she stopped.

"I can't do this..." she said," Well....at least not yet."

"Oh no!" Dustin thought.

"I'm sorry, Dustin, really I am," said Quinn, "...I can't do this yet. Your laugh was so adorable when the machine tickled you before and I've always wanted to know where your other tickle spots are."

Dustin's face went white.

"Tell you what," said Quinn, "If you tell me where your most ticklish spot is, I go easy on you."

He'd be tickled mercilessly either way, but Quinn's proposal seemed like the better choice.

"My feet," Dustin said reluctantly, "Especially in the arches and in between my toes."

Why did he tell her that?

"Thanks Dustin," giggled Quinn.

Quinn gently took her right index fingernail and raked it up the entire length of Dustin's right foot. He reluctantly smiled as his foot twitched, trying to hold back the laughter. That tickled like crazy! Imagine what'll be like in a few minutes. He'd rather not.

Quinn then took both of her index fingers and stroked Dustin's bare soles with them; a little faster than before. Dustin couldn't hold it back any longer. "Hahahahahahass stop stop stop stop hahahahahahahahahahahaha that th h hahahat tick hihihihihihickles!"

Quinn then took her index fingers and made little circles around the balls of Dustin's feet, then down to his arches. Dustin squealed with laugher. This was too much torment. "S STOP IT!" He exclaimed between laughs. "IT TICKLES!" "IT TICKLES!" The insane laughter continued.

"I know it tickles, Dustin, I know..." Quinn said softly as she continued to torment his feet. "...I bet this tickles even more!" Quinn formed her fingers into claws and raked them up Dustin soles, followed by wiggling her fingers all over (top and bottom) his sensitive preteen feet. Dustin had never laughed this loud in his life. this ticklish torture was too much to bear!

Next, Quinn took her fingers and spread apart Dustin's big and second toes on his right foot. She then used her index finger to tickle in between his toes. Tears shot from Dustin's eyes. He begged and begged for Quinn to stop in between laughs. It tickled so much.

After a little while, Quinn stopped and went to her "Toolbox of Tickle." She pulled out a long, soft, white feather.

Dustin could have cried.
114.title: A cure for ticklishness?

1141.content:
"Well Dustin, your feet are pretty ticklish but what about your belly?" Quinn asked with curiosity as she lifted his shirt up exposing a pale flat tummy.

"No Quinn, please don't tickle my belly it's my second most ticklish spot" Dustin claimed with eyes in fear.

"But it's just so cute" she said as she began dragging the feather across his ticklish belly from side to side.

"Puuhhleeasseee stahhppp Quinn", then his laughter shot up an octave as the feather was circling around the rim of his navel.

Quinn continued to circle the navel and occasionally dipped inside as she called it his tickle button.
Dustin continued to thrash in his bonds trying to escape the feather twirling inside.

"I can't taakeee it annyyyy mmooreee!" Dustin said with tears in his eyes.

"Fine I'll stop for now or maybe I won't." Quinn pondered
1141.title: Quinn uses the feather on his ribs and belly.

11412.content:
"Your belly button is so cute I just don't want to stop!" Quinn claimed as she removed the feather from his shallow navel.

"Sttayy awwwaayyy from my nnaavvel plleeeaasse!" Dustin cried.
Quinn then circled the belly button with her nail and began poking the base and going against the wall.

"Quinn tickle me anywhere else just not my belllyyy buuuttonnn!" Dustin said as he felt quinn's finger torment his lil belly button.

"You like raspberries Dustin?" Quinn asked.

"Uh yes?" Dustin said not knowing what she was getting at.

Then she clamped her lips onto the flat belly and blew into the indent of his navel
It was the repeated raspberries into the ticklish area that sent him over the edge.
"Quinn no mooooorrreee ppplleeaassse!" Dustin begged as sweat and saliva pooled in the ravaged navel and his face was bright red.
11412.title: Belly Button!

1142.content:
Quinn took the feather and the toolbox as she walked her way up to Dustin's torso.

"What are you going to do with the feather?" Dustin asked nervously.

"I might just use it to do this!" Quinn began to stroke the feather up and down the right armpit of Dustin leaving him to laugh sheepishly.

"THAT TICKLES" Dustin tried to yelp as the soft feather worked its way through his armpit.

Quinn kept aggressively tickling up and down the armpit with the feather which increasingly caused Dustin to laugh, but after some time she moved on over to the other armpit and began to tickle that one.

"So Dustin which armpit is more ticklish?"

"THEY BOTH ARE" Dustin squealed as the feather kept making contact with his armpit.

After some time tickling his armpits, Quinn went back into her tool box but instead of returning with a new item, she just started to rake up Dustin's armpits to tickle him.

"QUINN! THAT TICKLES!" Dustin screamed as Quinn placed both hands in one of his armpits and tickled his armpits.

This tickling went on for a few minutes as Dustin squirmed around from the tickling. But then, Quinn was finished tickling his armpits.

"Are you done tickling me?" Dustin asked as he finally began to catch his breath from all the tickling.
1142.title: Quinn uses the feather on his armpits

1231.content: One day zoey was relaxing in the main room of her dorm when quinn came running to her. "Zoey i need your help with an experiment.""Ok", zoey said "what do u need?""Come to my room."she said. As they arrived zoey saw a strange contraption. Quinn saw she was confused."Okay zoey im doing an experiment to study the reactivity of the human nervous system. I am going to be the test subject so i need your help performing the actual test." "Okay" zoey said confused. Quinn nodded and faced the machine.It looked like a huge disk suspendedwith a big letter x inside.Quinn laid down on the x.She put her head down and metal straps wrapped her wrists and ankles."Okay zoey lets begin...

12311.content: "zoey would you kindly remove my shoes." Zoey took off quinns flip flops, expsoing her pale, bare feet."Now stimulate the nerves in my feet and the machine will record my reaction.""What?" zoey said."I want you to tickle my feet." quinns said wiggling her toes. zoey hesitated and began the experiment. zoey stroked her finder from the heel of quinns foot up to her toes. quinn flinched and the machine beeped."Good, quinn said "but i need nore exstensive research, tickle me more."

123111.content: zoey then danced her fingers across quinns soles.Quinn squirmed feeling the tickling sensation fill her body.She screamed with laughter scrunching her toes trying to stop zoeys prying fingers, but it was no use.Seeing that quinn was straining zoey stopped.Quinn immediatly said, "NO NO AHA DONT STOP AHA MORE, MORE AHA ITS FOR SCIENCE!!""Okay", zoey said,"where are you most ticklish?"."MY TOES, GET MY TOES.""Alright but your struggling a lot, its kind of hard to get at your toes.""Protocol beta"quinn said as the machine sprouted small strings that wrapped quinns toes pulling them back.

13.content: Multiple guys or multiple girls?
13.title: Both

1311.content:
This story takes place in the

One Saturday at PCA, Chase, Logan and Michael, were sitting around in their room, doing nothing.
"Hey, can we go do something?" Michael asked, bored.
"Yeah, we should go do something," Chase agreed.
"Umm, how about we go and prank the girls!" Logan said.
"Okay," Michael and Chase agreed.
They decided upon, a really great prank. They, went to the girls dorm and waited behind a bush until Lola, Quinn and Zoey came out. As soon as they did, Logan jumped out, throwing balloons at them, which were filled with honey, then Chase came out with a huge fan and turned it on, blowing feathers, which Michael threw in front of it, all over the girls.
"Aaaaahhhhhh!" the girls screamed.
Chase, Logan and Michael ran as fast as they could, laughing hysterically all the way tot their dorm.
"Hahaha! That was so, funny!" They all yelled.
"Rrrrrr, we have to get them back!" Lola said.
"Definitely," Quinn and Zoey agreed.
Using Quinn's newest device, they figured out what would best work against the boys.
They would...
1311.title: The Big Prank

13111.content:
"My machine says the best way to get back at them, is to tickle them," Quinn said, astonished.
"REALLY!?" the Lola and Zoey replied.
"Yeah, so are we gonna do it?" Quinn asked.
"Definitely!" Lola and Zoey agreed.
That night, while Chase, Logan and Michael were sleeping, the girls went into their rooms and tied them up, their feet and hands to the bed posts. Lola decided to tickle Michael in the single bed, Quinn took Logan in the top bunk and Zoey with Chase on the bottom bunk. The girls took off their shirts and tickled them until they awoke.
"Ha-hey, what are you doing?" Logan said, as Quinn lightly tickled his ribs.
"Let us go!" Michael and Chase said.
"Sorry boys, but were going to tickle you first as punishment for pranking us!" The girls said.
Then...
13111.title: The Guys' Punishment- Decided

131111.content:
"Let's start out, one at a time, Quinn you go first," Zoey said.
"Okay," Quinn said, starting to drag her fingers all over Logan's ribs and belly.
"Ahahaha he-hey don't. Haha I'm ticklish!" Logan said.
"I know, that's why were ticking you," Quinn said, scratching Logan's abs, up and down.
She tickled and tickled, then getting a feather and putting it in Logan's bellybutton.
"AAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HEEEEEY PLEEEEEASE STAHAHAHAP HAHAHAHA! NOOOOO! NOT THERE! PLEEEASE NOT THE BELLY-BUTTON!" Logan begged.
Quinn then started to tickle Logan's feet, taking an electric tooth brush and scrubbing his soles with it.
"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA NOOOOOOOO! DOOOON'T USE THAT! AHAHAHAHAHA PLEEEEASE STAHAHAHAP TICKLING MY ARCHES!" Logan sceamed.
"Well, Logan, you are really ticklish and I haven't tickled you best spot, your armpits!" Quinn threatened.
"No! Please! Come on don't tickle my pits! I'll die!" Logan pleaded.
Unfortunately for him, Quinn had already started to scribble her fingers in Logan's hairy armpits. She tickled and tickled them and then used the electric tooth brush to finish the job.
"AAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHAH NOOOOOOO! NOT MY PITS! AAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHA PLEEEEEEASE STAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAP! AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO! DOOOOON'T USE THE TOOTHBRUSH! PLEEEEEASE! AAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"
Logan screamed.
Quinn decided to stop and said, "Okay girls, I think he's had enough for now. It's one of your turns!"
131111.title: Logan's Torment

1311112.content:
"Okay, Michael it's your turn!" Lola said, as she walked over to the end of Michael's bed and pulled off his socks. She immediately scribbled her nice, long nails all over Michael's rough soles.
"AAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA NOOOOOOOOO! PLEEEEEEASE STAAAHAHAHAHAP! I HATE BEING TICKLED! AAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! COME ON! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! PLEEEEEASE! PLEEEEEEASE! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!" Michael yelled.
"This is really funny, Michael, you guys are sooo ticklish!" Lola commented.
She kept tickling his feet for a little bit and then decided to really go for the kill! She got up and walked over to Michael's shirt, taking it off and wiggling her fingers threateningly over Michael's belly.
"NO! Please! Not my stomach! Please!" Michael begged.
"Sorry Michael, but Quinn tickled Logan in his most ticklish spot, so I have to tickle you on yours, too," Lola said. She scribbled her fingers all over Michael's belly and flanks and kneaded he fingers into his ribs and hips, even going so far as dip her finger in Michael's belly-button.
"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! PLEEEEEEASE! STAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAP! I CAN'T TAKE IT! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! NOOOOOO! NOT THE HIPS! AAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! PLEEEEEEASE! NOOOOOOOO! COME ON I'M SORRY! AAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! NOOOOOOOOOO! NOT THE BELLY-BUTTON! NOT THE BELLY-BUTTON! PLEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEASE! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!" Michael screamed, laughing hysterically.
"Well, I guess he's had enough. Zoey it's your turn!" Lola said.
1311112.title: Michael gets tickled!

13111121.content:
"Great! Are you ready to get tickled Chase?!" Zoey asked.
"No! come on Zoe, please! I'm way too ticklish!" Chase begged.
"Aww, really," Zoey started, as she pulled up his shirt, "Maybe I won't then... NOT!"
Zoey scribbled her fingers all over Chase's ticklish ribs, arm pits and even on his sensitive stomach.
"AAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA NOOOOOOOOOOOOOO! PLEEEEEEEEEEEASE STAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAP! I'M TOO TICKLISH! AAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! ZOE PLEEEEEEASE! I CAN'T TAKE IT! AAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!" Chase screamed.
"Wow, Chase! I had no idea you were so ticklish! I love it, I could tickle you all DAY!" Zoey said.
"All ha day! No hoho pleease! Zoey, I hate being tickled!" Chase pleaded.
"Ok, I won't, but I still have to tickle those FEET!" Zoey said.
"NO! I'll do anything! Just please don't tickle my feet! PLEASE!" Chase begged.
Unfortunately for Chase, Zoey had already made up her mind.
She moved over to Chase's feet and said, "Socks in bed! You really must be ticklish!"
She tickled all over Chase's socked feet for what seemed like forever, to him.
"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! ARE YOU EVER GOING TO STAAAAHAHAHAHAHAP! COME ON ZOE! PLEEASE! I CAN'T TAKE IT! AAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!" Chase shrieked, howling with laughter.
"Okay, now, it's time to tickle your BARE FEET!" Zoey taunted.
"NO! NO! NO! I'll Die! Don't! PLEEEAASE!" Chase begged again.
"Sorry, but I'm going to and theirs nothing you can do about it!" Zoey said.
"NOOOOOOOOOO! PLEEEEEEEEEASE! AAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! COME ON ZOE! PLEEEEEEEEEASE! I'M GONNA DIE! AAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! PLEEEEEEEEEEASE! I CAN'T TAKE IT! AAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!" Chase screamed, as Zoey tickled Chase's bare soles and all over the sides, too.
As much as Zoey loved this, when she started to tickle in between and even under Chase's toes and his laughter shot up an octave, she loved it even more. As a result she tickled there for twice as long.
"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! ZOE PLEEEEEEASE! AAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! I'M GONNA DIE! I'M ... I'M.. AAAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! PLEEEEEEEEEEASE STAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAP! STAHAP STAHAP! PLEEEEEASE! I CAN'T TAKE IT! ZOEY PLEEEEASE I'LL DO ANYTHING! ANYTHING! PLEEEEASE! AAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA AAAhahaha... hahaha... ha..." Chase laughted, before he fainted.
"Oops! I didn't mean to make him faint, oh well," Zoey said.
Meanwhile, Lola and Quinn had resumed tickling Logan and Michael and they had fainted to.
"Yeah Michael fainted to, after tickling his belly, he passed out, quickly," Lola said.
"Yeah, same here, just a little tickling on Logan's arm pits and he was out like a light," Quinn said.
"I guess we can let them go now," Zoey said.
"Yeah," Lola and Quinn agreed.
They untied then and left for the beach.
13111121.title: Chase's Torture

1321.content: Lola and Zoey went through the PCA Campus. Logan and Michael waited for them with a net trap, wearing a mask. The giggling girls went in the trap and were caught. Logan and Michael carried them to their room. "HELP! HELP !",the girls screamed. Logan blindfolded them while Michael tied her to the beds in an I-Shape. ( Zoey was wearing a T-Shirt, jeans and flats without socks ;Lola was wearing a tank top, a jeans, knee boots and white socks). Logan placed a big box with tickling tools on the table beside the bed. What are you going to do?", zoey said knowing who was kidnapping them. " are you ticklish?", logan asked while tickling zoeys belly which was her most ticklish spot. Everytime he tickled her toes made her laugh alot more. Logan tickled zoeys feet with his fingers which made her laugh a bit. Michael and Logan untied Lola's feet and tied her feet spread so everyone has one foot to tickle. They raked all fingers over her socked soles which made her laugh alot more than before. info.brief_description: This is a Fanfiction about the kids of Zoey 101 get tickled.
info.description:
This Fanfiction contains stories about the people from iCarly and the situations in which they get tickled. This is an acted tv show, appearing on Nickelodeon and was created by Dan Schneider.

Please add on as much as you like, while still abiding by the following rules:
- Please keep it PG
- No nudity
- No Sex
- No killing

Thank You and enjoy
